gophergfx

  • Axes2

Class Axes2

The Axes2 class is used for creating a 2D X and Y axes with a specified size.

Hierarchy

  • Line2
    • Axes2
  • Defined in src/geometry/2d/Axes2.ts:6

intersects

  • intersects(other: Transform2, mode?: IntersectionMode2): boolean

  • Checks if this Transform2 intersects another Transform2, using either a BoundingCircle or AxisAlignedBoundingBox

    Returns

    A boolean indicating whether the two objects intersect

    Parameters

    • other: Transform2

      The Transform2 to check for intersection with

    • mode: IntersectionMode2 = IntersectionMode2.BOUNDING_CIRCLE

      The mode to use for intersection (defaults to BOUNDING_CIRCLE)

    Returns boolean
